name: Capricorn Shura
description:
Shura belongs to the fabled rank of Gold Saint hierarchy among the other 12 Gold Saints. 
His Guardian Star is of the Zodiac sign of Capricornus.
Is the Gold Saint that underwent some modifications in his ideology when the manga was adapted to animation.
Him doesn't believe anyone fights for a god anymore, so he doesn't care about fighting for Athena. 
He considered that those with power, were automatically qualified to be judged just. 

#046 Saint Seiya Pack
